name: MovieTrivia
0:
”Alexa open movie media and tell me a trivia”
”Alexa ask movie media for a fact”
”Alexa open movie media and tell me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie media
des:
This alexa skill is developed for movie lovers. It brings you hundreds of interesting trivia about various movies. This is a media house for all the latest movies and updates.

For Example,
USER: " Alexa open movie media."
ALEXA: "Here's an interesting fact: 97% of people type in random words on Google, just to see if they spelled it right."

Prerequisites: Amazon Echo or Any Alexa enabled device.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
